about_the_game:
In 2033, a small town was captured by artificial intelligence machine. The voluntary chipping is carried out in accordance with the instructions of the "Greenhouse" corporation in order to control the population. The corporation produces microchips implanted in human. A small town was captured by drones. The points for chipping people are installed everywhere. Now these days the exchange currency is also microchips!



You have resieved an invitation from the "Greenhouse" corporation for free chipping. But everyone decides for himself whether he wants to chip himself or not. Now your life is in your hands:

  • Collect microchips.
  • Resist drones.
  • Destroy the points for chipping people.

This game has 3 levels/locations:

  • Explore the abandoned mine under your hometown.
  • Free you hometown from surveillance and wiretapping.
  • Destory the warehouse of microchips at the docks.

name: The voluntary chipping

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Graphics: opengl 3.0 support or higher
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: You have resieved an invitation from the "Greenhouse" corporation for free chipping. But you have a choice not to be enslaved! You have to fight back against cyber machines.
